services.title: Our Passion
services.subtitle: Started as individuals at school, we grew into a team of creators exploring both board games and computerized simulations.

items.web_projects_desc: Building fun, experimental, and useful websites using modern frameworks like React and Vue.
items.mobile_experiments_desc: Tinkering with native and cross-platform mobile apps to learn and solve real-world problems.
items.open_source_desc: Contributing to and maintaining open source projects. We believe in sharing knowledge.
items.hackathons_desc: Participating in hackathons to challenge ourselves, meet new people, and build cool stuff fast.
items.creative_coding_desc: Exploring the intersection of art and code. Making things that look cool and inspire.
items.learning_together_desc: Sharing resources, hosting workshops, and growing together as a community of developers.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Established in 2025, we are a team of students bridging the gap between board games and computerized simulations. What started as individual passion projects converged when we met at school, uniting under a shared vision.

milestone1.title: The Spark
milestone1.desc: Started as individuals working on personal projects. School brought us together.

milestone2.title: Board Game Origins
milestone2.desc: Formed the team and began developing board games after class.

milestone3.title: Digital Shift
milestone3.desc: Ventured into computerized simulation and webapps, embracing 'vibe-coding' with Trae.

milestone4.title: Official Launch
milestone4.desc: Setting up our backend server and launching the official website. Expanding from our Bilibili community to the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We are F1 fans, aviation enthusiasts, and creative minds. While some of us code, others design, bringing a diverse set of skills to the table. Based in China but open to the world, we are growing our community beyond our 1000+ Bilibili fans.
mission.quote: Code is our canvas, and we are just getting started. Let's build something awesome together.
mission.author: The GPS Team

products.title: Hard-Core Mechanisms
products.subtitle: Computerized simulations and boardgames focused on aviation and motorsports. No flashy UI—just pure functionality.
products.no_items: No products found in this category.

flight_sim.name: Commercial Flight Dynamics
flight_sim.description: High-fidelity computerized simulation of commercial aircraft aerodynamics and systems.
flight_sim.mechanism: 6-DOF rigid body physics, real-time fluid dynamics approximation, complex avionic state machines.

race_strategy.name: DeltaDash 3.1 BETA
race_strategy.description: Openwheel boardgame with delicate strategy management and memes.
race_strategy.mechanism: Sophisticated strategy management, resource luck-press, and expansion compatibility.

telemetry.name: Telemetry Analyzer
telemetry.description: Tool for analyzing racing telemetry data to optimize lap times.
telemetry.mechanism: Data ingestion pipeline, suspension travel analysis, cornering G-force mapping, throttle/brake trace overlay.

atc_sim.name: Terminal Control
atc_sim.description: Air Traffic Control simulation for high-density terminal airspace.
atc_sim.mechanism: Aircraft separation algorithms, wake turbulence modeling, RNAV approach pathing, conflict detection logic.

skyline_tragedy.name: Skyline Tragedy
skyline_tragedy.description: 6-DOF simulation with comprehensive flight initialization and parameter configuration.
skyline_tragedy.mechanism: 6-DOF physics, SSO integration, difficulty scaling, NPC crew intelligence.

policies.market_content:
Our Market allows you to trade tickets and support projects.

Prices fluctuate based on demand. High-risk items like Driver Bets may result in total loss.

Always research before investing.
policies.token_rep_content:
Tokens are our internal currency for trading and rewards.

Reputation reflects your contribution and trust level. High reputation unlocks advanced features like creating campaigns.
policies.mission_content:
Complete missions to earn Tokens and Reputation.

Submissions are reviewed by admins. Quality work is rewarded; spam or low-effort submissions will be rejected.
policies.betting_content:
Driver Bets are high-risk binary options. You bet on a specific outcome (e.g., 'Piastri Wins').

If the event happens, 'YES' tickets pay out 100% of the pool (proportional to holdings), while 'NO' tickets become worthless, and vice versa.

There is no guaranteed return. Resolution is manually verified by the creator/admin.
policies.minigame_content:
Entry Cost: 1 Token per play.

Rewards:
1. Instant: 5 Tokens for a valid score (60m cooldown).
2. Monthly Championship: Top 10 players share the prize pool (Base 500 + 2 Tokens per play).

Anti-Cheat: Reactions under 110ms are rejected.
policies.fees_content:
Market Fee: 2% on every peer-to-peer ticket trade.

Minigame Fee: 1 Token entry fee contributes to the monthly prize pool.

Token Supply: Earned via Missions (variable) and Daily Login. Burnt via fees and penalties.
